body_html:
Thanks for further explanation (and also answering questions in mailing list 😆). We are still testing the distribution strategy API and its GDR extension, and hopefully get it upstream before v2.0.

Looking further, as DistributionStrategy will be a prominent API for scaling model training, we hope that the collective ops could be extended by networking plugin (after contrib is removed), i.e. RecvBuf, along with the RecvTensor RPC. We could discuss more details later.
